What is Neon?

Neon is the 3D game that I have been working for quite some times now, Neon is a pixel-based indie cyberpunk game. In a world where the city has been captured by the AI system, the player will have to learn how to survive. Gloomy atmosphere, stylish neons, and the struggle of a man with machines
